short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Help user sleep during Microsoft Teams call

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Auto cut Microsoft Teams calls if number of attendees go below the limit set by user.
Manages the call even if the user sleeps during the call :D.

For using this extension, open teams web application at https://teams.microsoft.com/.
